text: Bahari is a census town in Barpeta district in the state of Assam, India. ==Demographics== India census, Bohari had a population of 7976. Males constitute 52% of the population and females 48%. Bohari has an average literacy rate of 59%, lower than the national average of 59.5%; with male literacy of 67% and female literacy of 51%. 13% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==References== Category:Cities and towns in Barpeta district Category:Barpeta
title: Bohari
